plot: A mockumentary of an 'average man', and his partner, a ficus benjamina - how they met, how they are viewed by family, friends, experts and society, the controversies they have to challenge.
title: Plant Life
plot_es: A mockumentary of an 'average man', and his partner, a ficus benjamina - how they met, how they are viewed by family, friends, experts and society, the controversies they have to challenge.
plot_en: A mockumentary of an 'average man', and his partner, a ficus benjamina - how they met, how they are viewed by family, friends, experts and society, the controversies they have to challenge.
